items.content_html: A lightweight, reusable utility for interacting with Redis. This library provides an easy-to-use interface for managing Redis data, including support for hash tables, key-value pairs, TTLs (expiry), and debugging. Built to simplify integration with Redis in Node.js services
items.title: MilynDsilva/Redis-Client: A lightweight, reusable utility for interacting with Redis. This library provides an easy-to-use interface for managing Redis data, including support for hash tables, key-value pairs, TTLs (expiry), and debugging. Built to simplify integration with Redis in Node.js services
